AnimeArsenal.ResourceGeneDef.label: Flower Breath
AnimeArsenal.ResourceGeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene embody the elegance and fluidity of blooming flowers, unleashing techniques that blend agility and vision with deadly precision. Their attacks are a mesmerizing dance of petals and blossoms, with enhanced perception at the cost of potential strain on their eyesight.
AnimeArsenal.ResourceGeneDef.resourceDescription: Current stored Breath, charged with the essence of frost. This energy powers devastating ice-based abilities, freezing enemies in their tracks.
